Description: あなたは変わった。@{K}You are not as you were before.
LevelDescriptionText: 0|あなたは儀式を放棄した~1|訪いの儀式 [ハートが20上昇し、アイアンが10下がります。]~2|炉床の儀式 [ミラーが20上昇し、ヴェールが10下がります。]~3|饗宴の儀式 [アイアンが20上昇し、ミラーが10下がります。]~4|慰めの儀式 [ヴェールが20上昇し、ハートが10下がります。]@{K}$Iron -> アイアン, Hearts -> ハート, Veils -> ヴェール, Mirrors -> ミラー$0|You have forsaken a rite~1|The Rite of Greeting [This has increased your Hearts by 20 and reduced your Iron by 10.]~2|The Rite of Hearths [This has increased your Mirrors by 20 and reduced your Veils by 10.]~3|The Rite of Feasting [This has increased your Iron by 20 and reduced your Mirrors by 10.]~4|The Rite of Solace [This has increased your Veils by 20 and reduced your Hearts by 10.]
ChangeDescriptionText: 1|あなたは訪いの儀式を行った。~2|あなたは炉床の儀式を行った。~3|あなたは饗宴の儀式を行った。~34|あなたは慰めの儀式を行った。@{K}1|You have partaken in the Rite of Greeting.~2|You have partaken in the Rite of Hearths.~3|You have partaken in the Rite of Feasting.~34|You have partaken in the Rite of Solace.
Name: 深淵の儀式: 儀式@{K}Abyssal Rites: Rite
